title: Jharkhand Image Goes Viral As ‘Ram & Sita Idols Found in Ayodhya’
subtitle: Ram-Sita Idols Found in Ayodhya Fact Check: Users on social media are sharing an old image from Jilinga village in Jharkhand to claim that it shows idols of Ram and Sita recovered from the temple site in Ayodhya.
author: www.thequint.com
vclaim:
On 21 May, the General Secretary of the Sri Ram Janmabhoomi Tirth Kshetra Trust - Champak Rai, confirmed that several ancient idols were found during the land levelling exercise at the Ram Mandir site in Ayodhya.

Soon after unrelated images started doing rounds on social media with claims that they show the idols and carvings which were excavated.

Users on social media are sharing an old image from Jilinga village in Jharkhand to claim that it shows idols of Ram and Sita recovered from the temple site in Ayodhya.
